alert.note: Alert for Haakon (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 2:38PM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of west central South Dakota, including the following counties, Haakon and Ziebach. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding along the Cheyenne River is ongoing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 237 PM MDT, gauge reports indicated flooding along the Cheyenne River caused by runoff from heavy rainfall. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southern Cheyenne River Reservation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
